mapper.select: SELECT b_num, b_subject, b_state FROM b_match WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
SELECT mat_num, mat_stdate, mat_hour, m_id FROM match WHERE b_num = #{b_num} and mat_state='A' order by mat_num

select * from ( select rownum rn, b_num,b_subject, b_state, m_id, r_num, r_contents, r_w_m_id, r_mat_m_id from ( select /*+ index_desc(match pk_mat) */ b.b_num, b.b_subject, b.b_state, re.m_id, re.r_num, re.r_contents, re.r_w_m_id, re.r_mat_m_id from b_match b left join (SELECT m.b_num, r.r_num, r.r_contents, m.m_id, r.r_w_m_id, r.r_mat_m_id FROM match m LEFT JOIN review r ON m.mat_num = r.mat_num where r.r_w_m_id = #{m_id} and r.r_del = 'N' order by m.b_num desc) re on b.b_num = re.b_num where b.m_id = #{m_id} ORDER BY b_num DESC) where rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}

select * from ( select rownum rn, mat_num, b_subject, mat_state, m_id, r_num, r_contents, r_w_m_id, r_mat_m_id from ( select /*+ index_desc(match pk_mat) */ m.mat_num, b.b_subject, m.mat_state, b.m_id, r.r_num, r.r_contents, r.r_w_m_id, r.r_mat_m_id from b_match b, match m LEFT JOIN review r ON m.mat_num = r.mat_num AND r_w_m_id = #{m_id} AND r.r_del = 'N' where b.b_num = m.b_num AND m.m_id = #{m_id} ORDER BY m.mat_num DESC) where rownum <= #{scri.pageNumP} * #{scri.amountP} ) where rn > (#{scri.pageNumP} - 1) * #{scri.amountP}
mapper.insert: insert into match(mat_num,b_num, m_id, mat_hour, mat_stdate) values(seq_mat.nextval,#{b_num},#{m_id},#{mat_hour},#{mat_stdate})
mapper.update: update match set mat_state = 'B' where b_num = #{b_num} and m_id != #{m_id} and mat_state = 'A'
update match set mat_state = 'C',mat_okdate = sysdate where mat_num = #{mat_num} and mat_state='A'
mapper.select: select count(mat_num) from match where b_num = #{b_num} and m_id = #{m_id}
select mat_num, b_num, m_id, mat_hour, mat_stdate,mat_wdate,mat_okdate,mat_state from match where b_num=#{b_num} and mat_state='C'
select mat_num from match where b_num = #{b_num} and m_id = #{m_id} and rownum = 1 order by m_wdate;
select mat_num, b_num, m_id, mat_hour, mat_stdate,mat_wdate,mat_okdate,mat_state from match where b_num = #{b_num}

select mat_num, b_num, m_id, mat_hour, mat_stdate, mat_wdate, mat_okdate, mat_state from ( select /*+ index_desc(match pk_mat) */ rownum rn, mat_num, b_num, m_id, mat_hour, mat_stdate, mat_wdate, mat_okdate, mat_state from match where rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} and (mat_state = 'A' or mat_state='B') and b_num=#{b_num}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
select count(mat_num) from match where b_num = #{b_num}
select count(mat_num) from match where b_num = #{b_num} and mat_state='C'
select count(mat_num) from match where m_id = #{m_id}

select b.b_num, m.mat_num,b.b_category,b.m_id w_m_id, m.m_id,m.mat_hour,m.mat_stdate,m.mat_state,mat_okdate from b_match b, match m where b.b_num = m.b_num and b.m_id=#{m_id} and m.mat_state='C' and b.m_id != m.m_id and mat_stdate like #{yearmonth}||'%' order by mat_stdate,mat_hour

select b.b_num, m.mat_num,b.b_category,m.m_id w_m_id, b.m_id,m.mat_hour,m.mat_stdate,m.mat_state,mat_okdate from b_match b, match m where b.b_num = m.b_num and m.m_id=#{m_id} and m.mat_state='C' and b.m_id != m.m_id and mat_stdate like #{yearmonth}||'%' order by mat_stdate,mat_hour
select count(mat_num) from match where mat_okdate like (sysdate + ${daygap}) and mat_state='C'
select count(mat_num) from match where (TO_CHAR(mat_okdate, 'YY/MM/DD')) <= (TO_CHAR(sysdate + #{daygap}, 'YY/MM/DD')) and mat_state='C'

select m.b_num, bo.m_id, m_phone, mat_stdate, mat_hour, b_location from match m , (select b_num, b.m_id, m_phone, b_location from b_match b, member me where b.m_id = me.m_id and b.b_del='N') bo where m.b_num = bo.b_num and m.m_id =#{m_id} and m.mat_stdate like #{yearmonth}||'%' and m.mat_state ='C'

select me.b_num, me.m_id, m_phone, mat_stdate, mat_hour, b_location from b_match b , (select b_num, mat.m_id, m_phone, mat_hour, mat_stdate from match mat, member m where mat.m_id = m.m_id and mat.mat_state='C') me where b.b_num = me.b_num and b.m_id =#{m_id} and me.mat_stdate like #{yearmonth}||'%'
